description: As a child you spent hours retrieving and cataloging priority, and you have become quite good at it. tomes and scrolls for older scholars who left you to your own Youth: As a child, you spent the majority of your days either devices once they had the materials they sought. Spending on the road or performing odd jobs and running errands for your these hours with little supervision, you learned the location of elders. You put any talents you had to work for you just to get by nearly every work stored in the library of the mountain abbey and perhaps earn a little food or a few spare coins. You might have you called home. While at that age you couldn’t fathom the turned to crime when things became desperate, or you might mysteries stored within, you kept a mental tally of those that have resisted all temptation no matter how bad things got. 131 IDENTITY BUILDING YOUR CHAPTER 5 You could have ended up on the road due to a number of every aspect of farm life and grew to appreciate the hard work reasons. You might have been separated from your family at a that was required just to put enough food on the table. In your young age due to war or some other disaster. A plague could have free time you learned to fi sh and hunt, supplementing your daily left you a sole survivor and driven you from your hometown. diet with game from the nearby wood or stream.
